Articles.Content: I would like to have the old KSP demo for reasons of nostalgia. Also mechjeb for that version of KSP, too, if it existed at that time.

Yes I do.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/9n9qnx8xs1wf2ss/KSP%200.13.2.rar

Actually this is 0.13.2, but its still the same as 0.13.3.

But what about:

Demo

This release is also a demo version of the game and will be until the developers decide to use a new demo version. (See 0.18.3)

Released 3rd March, 2012

New on 0.13.3:

A Stats Tracking System, so we can collect information of the game for statistical purposes.

Bug Fixes:

Fixed a bug with symmetry in the VAB.

Fixed an issue with the main camera that would create sporadic moments of lag in map view.

Fixed a bug that caused symmetrical parts to lose the reference to one of their counterparts, leading to incorrect symmetrical placements.

Reverted the Staging logic to the 13.1 system, as the changes made in 13.2 were buggy.

Note: 0.13.3 is an additional free version with bug fixes.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted%21%29?highlight=versions+wanted

If no one else has 13.3, I'll use 13.2, but I'd rather have 13.3.

Ninja'd

Posting others' content without consent.
I think you can email the novapunch creater (Tiberion) about olds versions, I remember getting the 0.13.3 demo version of NP before. Not sure about mechjeb
Because 13.3 is a demo version, you will most likely not be able to install plugins to the version. The fact that there is a new demo may have changed this, however.
With the power of Google, I have found this. I believe this is the latest version of MechJeb for 0.13, according to the wiki.
Mechjeb does not work.

Well then, here is the entire list of previous MechJeb versions. It has to be one before 1.5, so just try them out.

Edit: Well, found out that MechJeb in the demo doesn't work after some searching.

Edited June 12, 2013 by rryy

I don't think any of them work. I believe plugins were implemented in .14, anyway.

Tried version 1.0. It didn't work. It says that it wont work for this version of the game.

I Still need NP Remix.

EDIT: THANK YOU TIBERION! I GOT IT!

Edited June 12, 2013 by Aphox

Because 13.3 is a demo version, you will most likely not be able to install plugins to the version. The fact that there is a new demo may have changed this, however.

The current demo (0.18.3) has special settings that limit the parts to the stock parts in 0.18 and plugins can't be used in the demo either.
Original 0.13 demo could load custom made parts, but not plugins- the plugin system wasn't created till 0.14.

OP, please refrain from uploading other people's content that you do not own without their permission. Even if it's an old, outdated version of the mod, it's still someone else's work.

Thanks!

But what about:

Demo

This release is also a demo version of the game and will be until the developers decide to use a new demo version. (See 0.18.3)
